LanguageData.Goji_MustBeConnectedPawn: {PAWN_kindDef} must be the pawn connected to {TREE_labelShort}.
LanguageData.Goji_RitualTargetMustBeConnectedGauranle: Target must be a connected Gauranlen tree.
LanguageData.Goji_NoValidRecipientFound: No valid recipient found. The recipient must be a colonist of the same ideoligion who is not already connected to a Gauranlen tree.
LanguageData.Goji_RecipientAlreadyConnected: {PAWN_kindDef} is already connected to a Gauranlen tree.
LanguageData.Goji_ConnectionTransferred_Description: The Gauranlen tree connection was successfully transferred from {INITIATOR_labelShort} to {RECIPIENT_labelShort}.
LanguageData.Goji_RitualOutcomeExtraDesc_CocoonFormed: {PAWN_nameDef} was enveloped in a healing cocoon.
LanguageData.Goji_MustHaveInjuryOrIllnessForCocoon: {PAWN_kindDef} does not have any significant injuries or illnesses requiring cocoon healing.
LanguageData.Goji_CocoonHealedAllWounds: {0} has had all wounds healed by the cocoon.
LanguageData.Goji_CocoonHealedPermanentWound: {0} has had a permanent wound in the {1} healed by the cocoon.
